data_footnotes:
DTP: Diphtheria, tetanus, pertussis,
• HPV: Humane papillomavirus.
• HPV vaccination coverage among 15 year-old girls: Data are only available from 2011.
• 08/2014: Reduction of the recommended vaccination age for HPV vaccination from formerly 12-17 years with a 3-dose vaccination schedule to 9-14 years with a 2-dose vaccination schedule.
• Repeat vaccination (with 3 doses of vaccine) possible up to 17 years.
• 09/2015: Reduction of the vaccination schedule of the standard pneumococcal vaccine for mature-born infants from 4 (3+1 schedule) to 3 doses of vaccine (2+1 schedule).
• 06/2018: Introduction of HPV vaccination additionally for boys.
